name: Shooting Car 3D
description:
Shooting Car 3D is a RPG Shooting Casual Game,In this game, you are an arrogant gangster, looting the wealth you want. And you need to fight the enemy non-stop, repel the enemies who come to chase and kill, and protect your wealth.

KEY FEATURES:
-Easy to play: Tap to aim and shoot, lift to hide.
-The battle is full of joy and randomness. Accurately attacking different parts of the enemy can bring unexpected effects.
-In the fierce battle, you can also get a wealth of guns, vehicles, and clothing to strengthen your fighting ability.
